title: Bug 23787[Properties dialog] Project Properties Info page should not use text fields
description: Bug 23787[Properties dialog] Project PropertiesInfo page should not use text fields Integration build 09/17.Looks bad on all motif platforms.
OB: On motif platforms, the text fields in the Project Properties Info page have automatic borders, which identify them as user input targets. Additionally, on Solaris/AIX/HPUX platforms, these fields have different colored backgrounds that make them stand out much worse.
EB: The text fields in the Project Properties Info page on motif platforms should not have automatic borders and on Solaris/AIX/HPUX platforms, these fields should not have different colored backgrounds.
SR: To reproduce the issue: select a Project, right click and choose Properties. On the subsequent Info page, observe the readonly fields (the values for Path, Type, etc.).
